SEARCH
Package com.cloudhopper.mc.annotations

Annotationsschnittstelle Function

@Retention(SOURCE) @Target(METHOD) public @interface Function
Marks a class as a deployable cloud function. This annotation is used to indicate that the class should be discovered and processed during code generation. It defines properties such as the function's name and optional trigger configuration. Example usage: 
 
 @Function(name = "hello-world")
 public class HelloFunction implements CloudRequestHandler<String, String> {
     public String handleRequest(String input, HandlerContext context) {
         return "Hello, " + input;
     }
 }

    Modifizierer und Typ
    Erforderliches Element
    Beschreibung
    String
    name
    The unique name of the function in the deployment target.

  • Optionale Elemente - Übersicht

    Optionale Elemente
    Modifizierer und Typ
    Optionales Element
    Beschreibung
    int
    memory
    The maximum memory allocated to the function (in megabytes).
    int
    minInstances
    The minimum number of instances to keep warm.
    int
    timeout
    The function timeout in seconds.

  • Elementdetails

    • name

      String name
      The unique name of the function in the deployment target.
      Gibt zurück:
      the function name

    • memory

      int memory
      The maximum memory allocated to the function (in megabytes). Default is 128 MB.
      Gibt zurück:
      the memory limit in MB
      Standard:
      128

    • timeout

      int timeout
      The function timeout in seconds. Defines how long the function may run before being terminated. Default is 30 seconds.
      Gibt zurück:
      timeout in seconds
      Standard:
      30

    • minInstances

      int minInstances
      The minimum number of instances to keep warm. This enables pre-warming for reduced cold starts on some platforms. Default is 0.
      Gibt zurück:
      minimum instance count
      Standard:
      0
